Text:
+21 & MINUS 29???

FUCKING ASSHOLES 

IF YOU PUT A MINUS -SAY WHY
The English subtitles on this are completely bananas. There's whole scenes that are missing dialogue. Great quality though! :P
The subs are indeed off. This is because the European blu-ray did not include English subs and the release group seems to have attempted to resync the criterion dvd subs with this.
